definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: II. [[קיץ]] (√ of foll.; usu. taken as = I. [[קיץ]] but connex. not clear; cf. Ar. qayz.un vehement heat of summer, late summer (We:Skizzen iii, 90), qa0z.a be vehemently hot; Sab. [[קיטַ]] summer Mordtm:Him. Inschr. 71; NH [[קַיִץ]] = BH, so Targum [[קַיְטָא]] Syr. qayt.o0; Oaram. (Zinj.) [[כיחא]] summer).
